name: T-Rex World Multiplayer
description:
*** T-Rex World Multiplayer *** now with Chat! so you can speak with the other online players. This is a dinosaur simulator that allows you to play online against other people from across the globe. Upgrade your T-Rex to become the all powerful game winning giant. We added instant magic in the multiplayer version so you don't need to wait to collect the magic items. Work together or challenge real players to epic dino battles. Control your own customizable Tyrannosaurus Rex Dinosaur.

Or you may choose to play the offline. Explore the huge Jurassic map and build up your skill points and magic. Discover the Volcano with real lava, explore caverns, giant statues, and other mysteries. Collect all the magic elements in the offline map in order to craft your special abilities. Upgrade your speed, strength, and stamina. We try to provide the game with high quality graphics and a 3D Jurassic World map to explore. Velociraptors, Triceratops, Pterodactyl, and many other dinosaurs included.

Your dino will get hungry and thirsty so don't forget to eat and drink! You may also decide to team up and take down Giant bosses

Hunt weaker dinosaurs to keep your hunger levels up Drink water so you don't dehydrate. Watch out for the lava!

Top Game Features:

--- Real Time Multiplayer 3D Dinosaur Simulator Game
--- Chat with real players with the message window
--- Beautifully designed 3D Jurassic World Map
--- Upgrade your abilities to have a better change at winning 
--- Play head to head against real players around the world
 --- Real-time T-Rex action
--- Includes Off-line map to build experience and magic 

Other dinosaurs include Raptor, Spinosaurus, Pterodactly, Triceratops, T-rex, mososaurus, and Compagnathus.
Multiplayer is a new series of games we have created at Wild Foot. We listened to all your suggestions and tried to combine them into this game. We like to think it is 3D animal simulation at its best.

We would really love to hear from you. Be sure and stop by our Facebook page: https://www.facebook.com/wildfootgames for updates.   We welcome your constructive criticism. Please email us your suggestions. Our focus is making creative games with animals and magic. We think of our games as 3D animal simulators with something special added. Good luck and have a Wildfoot day!
